name: sonar
note: A full-stack web application for storing, tagging and searching images. Broken since Nov 28, 2022 as Heroku no longer has a free tier.

name: Trovia-E
note: A JavaFX application used to extract data from hex values by extensive use of regex.

name: boreal
note: A course finder for UofT's Faculty of Arts and Science, built out of frustration from numerous issues in the official timetable. Broken since Nov 28, 2022 as Heroku no longer has a free tier.

name: Sport & Rec Registrant
note: An automated tool to sign up for UofT Sport & Rec's gym sessions.
